TopicTitle: What are you doing while playing KSP?

Articles.Content:
I found this Ironic... >< What do you do while playing KSP (Say, waiting for long burns too eeloo!)

I'm watching this series! 8p (I'm bored) 

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/lFYaT-U82JY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Nothing like playing a space exploration game and indulging in flat earth information. 8D It's like having your cake and eating it too!
I pace around waiting because my computer isn't strong enough for doing anything else
Watching the news, CNBC ... follow the money.

Being an extreme multitasker, I either: 

Turn on the TV and watch a random series such as Parks and Recreation (For all-around multitasking)

I can't watch videos online; It causes tremendous lag.

But I mostly browse the forums and post; It's pretty easy to switch between both. (For normal occasions)

I usualy turn my attention away from the KSP rocketry to the second monitor, where I begin to study real rocketry. Or browse this forum, generally looking for interesting stuff about rocketry. Or just chill and listen to some music! Preferably rock (etry).

> 
> [...]
> But I mostly browse the forums and post; It's pretty easy to switch between both. (For normal occasions)

Exactly! When I'm testing a new craft I keep KSP alt-entered and just tab to settings on the forums, on longer missions I full-screen KSP, though.
I browse the forum and do space research.
